conversationHistory.userMessage: How should I store leftover dal?
conversationHistory.botResponse:
Hello! I can help you store leftover dal to minimize waste.

• Allow the dal to cool completely before storing. Transfer it to an airtight container. Store in the refrigerator for up to 3-4 days.

• Another option is to freeze the dal. Portion it into freezer-safe containers or bags. Frozen dal can last for up to 2-3 months.

• You can also transform leftover dal into dal paratha (estimated cost: 40 BDT).

Reducing food waste lessens the strain on Bangladesh's landfills.

Next step: Refrigerate your dal in an airtight container.
